participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time with my daughters and taking pictures of them.
I love spending time with my friends, whether it's going out to dinner, seeing a movie, or just hanging out at home.
I went scuba diving with my wife and friends to celebrate my birthday.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
i am currently pregnant with my second child.

participant_2.background:
I start my day with coffee and a quick practice session before heading off to city council meetings.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.
I think it is really cool to use my art to communicate with people.
I'm not as happy as I look, but my parents think I have everything I could ever want.
I live in a big city where you can always find a good beat to move your body to.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready for work. I'm a city council member, and we have a meeting today.
That sounds exciting! What do you like most about being a city council member?
I love being able to make a difference in my community. I also love working with other people to solve problems.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're very good at it.
Thank you! I try my best.
What do you do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. I also enjoy reading, painting, and listening to music.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and paint too.
Awesome! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mystery novels.
I love historical fiction too! I've been reading a lot of books about the Civil War lately.
That sounds really interesting! I've never read any books about the Civil War.
You should! It's a fascinating time period.
I will definitely check it out. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to share my love of books.
It looks like we have a lot in common! I'm glad we met.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests
